description:
Download the app that Consumer Reports, the Today Show, the Anderson Cooper Show, and the Clark Howard Show named a top grocery shopping app!
 
Pushpins helps you build and share your grocery list, save with digital coupons and weekly specials, and discover thousands of recipes.
 
We would love to hear your feature suggestions! We want to make this better and better. If you call (973-233-4540), email (feedback@pushpinsapp.com) or tweet (@pushpins) us, we will reply ASAP. Try it… I dare you.

FEATURES:

GROCERY LISTS
Create grocery lists by searching for the name or scanning the barcode of items in our database of 200K+ products. Set item quantity, price, pack size, and notes.

LIST SYNCING (NEW)
Sync your lists with family and friends and across all your devices via Pushpins, AirDrop, Email, or iMessage.

WEB ACCESS (NEW)
Build or edit your list on pushpinsapp.com. Just log in with your Pushpins account.

AISLE SORTING
Automatic sorting of your list items by aisle. Arrange the aisles to match your local store.

DIGITAL COUPONS
Clip digital coupons to your store loyalty card to save hundreds of dollars on your groceries.

Now Available at: D'Agostino, DeCA, Food City, Foodtown, Giant Eagle, Harps, Just Save Foods, Lowes Foods, MainStreet Market, Marsh, Nichols, Publix, Shop ‘n Save, ShopRite, Rite Aid, Weis Markets, and Winn Dixie.

STORE CIRCULARS
View weekly specials and add them to your list.

Currently available in: 55,000 grocery and drug stores across the country including Walmart, Target, CVS, Walgreens, Rite Aid, Costco, Safeway, Kroger, and more.

RECIPES
Discover over 500,000 recipes and add ingredients to your lists. Set dietary preferences (gluten-free, vegetarian, etc) to filter results.

LIST HISTORY (NEW)
Quick access to products you've recently purchased from the search bar on your shopping lists.

LIST FAVORITES
Favorite any item for quick access from the bookmarks bar while building your list.

NUTRITION FACTS
View the full nutrition label and ingredients of the items on your shopping list.

PRODUCT IMAGES
View high quality images of list items so you know exactly what to look for in-store.

OFFLINE ACCESS
Build and access your lists even if you don't have internet access.
 
STORE LOCATOR
View a map and driving directions to your nearby stores.

SHOPPING HISTORY
Keep track of your spend and savings on your weekly shops.

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Get notified of changes to your shared shopping lists and coupons that are about to expire.

PASSBOOK LOYALTY CARDS
Add your supermarket loyalty cards to Passbook for quick access of coupons/specials on your cards.
releaseNotes:
- Fixes an issue that could cause app to freeze when creating a new list
- Improved Loyalty Card Validation for many stores
- Other iOS 7.1 bug fixes
